sentences.en: A grey carpet was removed to reveal the original pine floor.
sentences.cn: 一块灰色的地毯被揭开，露出了原来的松木地板。

sentences.en: a test that can reveal a teacher’s hidden skills
sentences.cn: 能够展现老师潜在技能的测试

sentences.en: A wander around any market will reveal stalls piled high with vegetables.
sentences.cn: 随便到哪个市场逛逛，都能看见蔬菜堆得老高的菜摊。

sentences.en: Any trawl through the band's interviews will reveal statements that are challenging and incisive.
sentences.cn: 随便选取一段对该乐队的访谈都能发现令人深思、犀利精辟的言论.

sentences.en: Companies should be made to reveal more about their financial position.
sentences.cn: 应该要求公司使其财务状况更为透明化。

sentences.en: Experts reveal only as much as they care to.
sentences.cn: 专家们只透露了他们想透露的那些。

sentences.en: He may be prosecuted for revealing secrets about the security agency.
sentences.cn: 他可能因泄露安全部门的机密而被起诉。

sentences.en: He took off his shirt to reveal his tanned torso.
sentences.cn: 他脱下了衬衫展现出晒得黝黑的身体.

sentences.en: It is normal practice not to reveal details of a patient's condition.
sentences.cn: 不透露患者病情的细节是惯常的做法。

sentences.en: Microscopic examination of a cell's chromo-somes can reveal the sex of the fetus.
sentences.cn: 利用显微镜检查细胞染色体可以发现胎儿的性别。

sentences.en: She believed that she had been selected by the Master to reveal forgotten wisdom.
sentences.cn: 她认为自己是被长老选中来揭示被人们遗忘的智慧的。

sentences.en: She doesn't reveal much of her inner self.
sentences.cn: 她不大流露她的内心自我。

sentences.en: She was hauled before magistrates for refusing to reveal her age to a policeman.
sentences.cn: 她因拒绝告诉警察自己的年龄而被地方法院传讯。

sentences.en: The flower opens to reveal a Queen Bee.
sentences.cn: 花瓣展开，一只蜂王露了出来。

sentences.en: The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant.
sentences.cn: 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身份.

sentences.en: The wall caved in to reveal a blocked-up Victorian fireplace.
sentences.cn: 墙坍塌了，露出砌在里面的维多利亚时代的壁炉。

words.tran_cn: 透露真情的；有启迪作用的；袒胸露肩的

phrases.tran_cn: 显示全部（计算机操作命令）

trans.tran_en: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown

trans.tran_cn: 揭露， 泄露； 展现， 显示
trans.tran_en: to make known something that was previously secret or unknown
